original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1116)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(936)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成物理傷害同時產生燃燒狀態，且在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4675)@</color> 秒內可以任意穿越敵陣並沿途留下火焰。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1116)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(936)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage to the enemy in front of you, and at the same time creates a burning state, and within <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4675)@</color> seconds, you can arbitrarily pass through the enemy line and stay along Under the flame.
